post.body: So is ur name in the final shortlist or not? Why did they do tht all of a sudden? God knws wats happenin to the economy!
Hey congrats! thats great news.. N that too gettin placed in summers rite now is a daunting task.. so double congrats!
Try Nitro PDF... Uses lesser space n memory... n can edit PDFs as well...
finally figured out how to update my tweets as facebook status msgs!
First mod it was Marketing Mgmt, now it's Industrial Marketing. Earlier Operations Mgmt, then comes Operations research. Wonder wats next?
is having cold and fever... Hope I'll be ok by tmrw... Lots to study and I wudn't be getting enuf sleep for the next 5 days, thx to exams..
is studying for tmrw's Financial Management exam... Lots to study but nonetheless easier than Fin Accounting we had in the last mod...
lots to study... Of course, I had successfully passed my B.Tech. & MBA first mod exams! I guess I just need to slog out for few days nw ;)
had a batch meet and later kicked arvind on his bday & put evry damn shit on him rite frm cake to coke, robin liquid blue to egg yolk! :D
bored of studying... for the second time, i visited the library today :)
finally found a paper on innovation & NPD launch strategy (Industrial marketing). Now, have to make a presentation & study for test tmrw :(
had a really tiring day and a wonderful 'MAFIA' game session. The MAFIA won against the villagers in a thrilling finish... Wat a game it ...
Am tired with the project report n stuff... n I havent touched the book for a single min today! ;) Gnite everyone...
is busy making the project report on the effect of financial crisis on SMEs
is impressed by Yoono, the all-in-one social networkin add-on for Firefox!
is wondering why everyone is so tensed for exams when they are still 9 days far away...
heard a lot about twitter and finally thought of trying it out!
